action.action-desc: Mr. Tillis (for himself and Mr. Budd) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To revise the boundaries of a unit of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System in Topsail, North Carolina, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Town of North Topsail Beach Coastal Barrier Resources System Map Amendment Act of 2025.

paragraph.text: The term local zoning ordinance means zoning regulations in effect for the town of North Topsail Beach, North Carolina, as of the date of enactment of this Act.
The term Secretary means the Secretary of the Interior.

subsection.text: Not later than 30 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the Secretary shall make such corrections to the map described in subsection (d) as are necessary to exclude from Unit L06 of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System each parcel in the town of North Topsail Beach, North Carolina, that is designated by local zoning ordinance for purposes other than conservation as of the date of enactment of this Act.

paragraph.text: The Secretary shall consider each parcel described in subsection (b) to meet the criteria described in section 4(g)(1)(B) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act (16 U.S.C. 3503(g)(1)(B)).
This Act applies only to areas of Unit L06 of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System that are within the municipality of the town of North Topsail Beach, North Carolina.
